name: South African Ostrich Business Chamber
membership:
All Ostrich farmers and all export approved ostrich abattoirs and tanneries, are members of our organization (South African Ostrich Business Chamber)
www.saobc.co.za
goal: The South African Ostrich Business Chamber (SAOBC) is the official representative body of the South African ostrich industry, and represents all export registered ostrich farms and all export approved ostrich abattoirs and tanneries.  The focus of the association is to co-ordinate all export related activities, animal health issues, welfare issues, traceability and movement control of all ostriches, etc. Full detail is available on the website www.SAOBC.co.za
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: The South African ostrich industry exports raw and pre-heated ostrich meat to many EU countries since 1994. Also exported to the EU is ostrich leather to most of the major fashion houses of Europe.
